item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】[REQUEST] The Walkmen / Stellastarr* stuffs
item.description:
Hi.
For some time now I have been looking for the discography (albums and singles) of these two bands.
From The Walkmen I was able to get only one album: A Hundred Miles Off. I also got a torrent that apparently has all their discography including rare tracks, but after trying many times, I can't download anything.
From Stellastarr* I have not been able to get absolutely nothing.
I would be very grateful if anyone has any CD rips of either band. It doesn't matter if they have the artwork or not.
item.author: Aquiles_Castro
